description: During the [2016 Ukraine Electric Power Attack](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0025), DLLs and EXEs with filenames associated with common electric power sector protocols were used to masquerade files.(Citation: Dragos Crashoverride 2017)

external_references.description: Dragos Inc.. (2017, June 13). CRASHOVERRIDE Analysis of the Threat to Electric Grid Operations. Retrieved December 18, 2020.
